languages.text: {n}После двух часов непрестанной молитвы колени и плечи горят от напряжения, но воспаленные участки кожи продолжают изнурять вас нестерпимым зудом.{/n}
{n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}После двух часов непрестанной молитвы колени и плечи горят от напряжения, но воспаленные участки кожи продолжают изнурять вас нестерпимым зудом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, your knees and shoulders are burning with strain, but the inflamed areas of your skin are still tormenting you with unbearable itching.{/n}
{n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, your knees and shoulders are burning with strain, but the inflamed areas of your skin are still tormenting you with unbearable itching.{/n}
{n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}
{n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}
{n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}
{n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Después de dos horas de rezos incesantes, y a pesar del dolor ardiente de tus hombros y rodillas, tu piel inflamada sigue torturándote con un picor insufrible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de dos horas de rezos incesantes, y a pesar del dolor ardiente de tus hombros y rodillas, tu piel inflamada sigue torturándote con un picor insufrible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}2時間ひたすら祈り続けた後、膝や肩は緊張で火照てり、さらに炎症を起こした皮膚は未だに耐え難いかゆみに苛まれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}2時間ひたすら祈り続けた後、膝や肩は緊張で火照てり、さらに炎症を起こした皮膚は未だに耐え難いかゆみに苛まれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}长达两个小时的祈祷一刻不停地进行着，尽管你的膝盖与肩膀紧绷得仿佛要燃烧起来一样，但皮肤上的炎症依然没有消退，痒得让你无法忍受。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}长达两个小时的祈祷一刻不停地进行着，尽管你的膝盖与肩膀紧绷得仿佛要燃烧起来一样，但皮肤上的炎症依然没有消退，痒得让你无法忍受。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zwei Stunden unablässiges Beten später schmerzen deine Knie und Schultern, aber deine entzündete Haut quält dich nach wie vor mit unerträglichem Jucken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zwei Stunden unablässiges Beten später schmerzen deine Knie und Schultern, aber deine entzündete Haut quält dich nach wie vor mit unerträglichem Jucken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deux longues heures de prières incessantes plus tard, vous avez les genoux et les épaules en compote, mais votre peau infectée continue à vous tourmenter et les démangeaisons à vous rendre {mf|fou|folle}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deux longues heures de prières incessantes plus tard, vous avez les genoux et les épaules en compote, mais votre peau infectée continue à vous tourmenter et les démangeaisons à vous rendre {mf|fou|folle}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İki saat boyunca şifalı dualar okuduktan sonra, dizlerin ve omuzların zorlanmaktan yanar hâle gelmesine rağmen kızarmış tenin hâlâ dayanılmaz derecede kaşınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two hours of incessant prayer later, despite your knees and shoulders burning with strain, your inflamed skin still torments you with unbearable itching.{/n}
